itunes:title: Episode 556 - Brainwashing Beavers With War Propaganda
title: Episode 556 - Brainwashing Beavers With War Propaganda
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome the Kill Cliff Podcast for a crossover episode that completely goes off the rails as we talk about replacing Punxatawney Phil on Groundhog's Day with fighting beavers wearing opposing jerseys of "Spring" and "Winte...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome the Kill Cliff Podcast for a crossover episode that completely goes off the rails as we talk about replacing Punxatawney Phil on Groundhog's Day with fighting beavers wearing opposing jerseys of "Spring" and "Winter" and having them fight to the death after watching Nazi War propaganda to decide on when the seasons will end.  You're welcome.
